entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: mvc #48550
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, plaintext, plainTextSansFilter #48549
  • Application created from Worker Service template violates CPU usage limit and consume all available swap space #48548
  • QuickGrid Link Value #48552
  • RDF emits incorrect code when `ThrowOnBadRequest` is disabled with AsParameters and null binding #48547
  • LoadFromStoreCert method of the CertificateLoader class does not load a certificate with an exact subject match #48545
  • Duplicate click events #48542
  • Perf improvement: endpoint #48539
  • Perf improvement: json, plainTextEmptyFilter, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #48538
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, mapaction, plainTextSansFilter #48537
  • Rename metrics counter names #48536
  • Missing File/Documents when trying to run the BestForYou: Blazor United Demo #48533
  • Add RateLimiterServiceCollectionExtensions.AddRateLimiter #48531
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Review types passed to metrics tags #48530
    .NET 8 Planning
  • ASP.NET Identity cookie value set to blank. #48529

Closed

  • Include Next Js 13 or latest version in template #48502
  • ComponentState isn't always disposed #48411
    8.0-preview5
  • ApplicationPartManager and IOC #48520
  • Blazor Style files for default project templates are not loaded correctly when using custom environment variables #48541
  • compile from source aspnetcore 6.0.16 report error #48540
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, mapaction #48509
  • textarea binding does not work in Blazor Server when pasting long text #48505
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.RateLimiting metrics #47745
  • Allow ProblemDetails property to be settable in ProblemDetailsContext #47633
    8.0-preview6

PullRequests

Created

  • Update RDG to use interceptors feature #48555
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • [Blazor] Take cascading parameter attribute type into account when supplying cascading values #48554
    area-blazor
  • RDF test migration (part 3) #48553
    feature-rdg, area-minimal

Merged

  • Update method modifiers to address CA1822 #48551
    needs-area-label, 8.0-preview6
  • [Blazor] Initial support for [SupplyParameterFromForm] #48412
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview6
  • Verify response json body #48534
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview6
  • Make problemdetails settable in problemdetailscontext #48510
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview6

Updated

  • [Blazor] Support for primitive types in [SupplyParameterFromForm] #48432
    area-blazor
  • Sections with other features #48518
    area-blazor
  • [7.0] Allow overriding the host header if doesn't match the absolute-form host #48415
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.x
  • Do not emit unused fields in RDG source #48426
    community-contribution, feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • [Blazor] Cache LayoutAttribute lookup #48439
    area-blazor
  • Implement output-cache store using redis #48450
    area-runtime, feature-output-caching
  • Introduce KestrelServerOptions.AllowUnsafeHostHeaderOverride #48460
    blocked, area-runtime
  • Avoid repetitive GCHandles in IIS WebSocket operations #48462
    servers-iis, area-runtime
  • Updated the AddPolicyRegistry extension methods to use TryAdd and TryAddEnumerable internally #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add dependency injection support for object pools #48217
    area-runtime
  • SDK update. #48511
    area-infrastructure
  • [wasm][debugging] Enable debugging when Device Toolbar is enabled and Iphone is selected #48527
    area-blazor
  • use new System.Text.Ascii APIs, remove internal helpers #48368
    area-runtime
  • Rename ASP.NET Core metrics #48375
    blocked, area-runtime, area-signalr
  • feat: add StringSyntaxAttribute for guid and timespan args #48402
    area-runtime, community-contribution
